seniority_level.evidence: 3+ years experience requirement with Data Engineer title, not explicitly 'Senior' but beyond entry level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with focus on Cognos reporting and visualization

sub_specialty.evidence: Broad BI focus with reporting, visualization, and ETL mentioned but no specific specialization emphasized

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of mentoring, team leadership, or technical leadership responsibilities - pure IC role

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, and Azure all mentioned as nice-to-have with no single cloud platform emphasized

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud platforms mentioned as preferred experience

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on reporting and visualization with ETL tools suggests batch processing workflows

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in requirements

storage_layer.evidence: BI/reporting focus with Cognos typically works with structured data warehouse environments

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location requirement in Pune, Maharashtra, India with no remote work options mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: Role based in Pune, India indicating Asia/Kolkata timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Must already be in Pune location - no relocation assistance or requirements mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: India-based role, H1B sponsorship not applicable for domestic positions

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based role, OPT/CPT not applicable for domestic hiring

citizenship_required.evidence: Must be authorized to work in India - no citizenship requirement specified

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time position at IBM with benefits mentioned suggests traditional W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: IBM as large corporation likely offers standard corporate benefits package

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, advancement opportunities, or growth paths mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career growth opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No IC track, management track, or specialist track options mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required (Cognos, 3+ years) and nice-to-have (cloud platforms, ETL tools)

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined BI data engineer role with specific responsibilities and clear skill requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Reasonable 3+ years experience requirement and appropriate skill set for mid-level BI engineer position
